message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $18,000 is well above what I'm able to pay. I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $8,500 at this time.

I understand that $18,000 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I've done some research and I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the product.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $14,000 is still out of my range. I'm prepared to pay $9,500 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't reach an agreement.

I understand you're willing to walk away, Bob, but I'm not ready to let the deal go yet. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $13,500. It's a fair price, considering the value the product will bring to you.
